sentence: The  Houthis  have  said  their  attacks  are  in  response  to  Israel's  air  and  ground  assault  on  Gaza,  which  has  killed  nearly  25,000  Palestinians,  according  to  Gaza's  Health  Ministry.
The  military  campaign  in  Gaza  followed  the  Oct.  7  attack  by  Hamas  that  Israel  says  killed  1,200  people.
